( Karen Warren / Houston Chronicle ) Photo: Karen Warren, Houston Chronicle Image 16 of 16 Trip Advisor: Pappas Bros. in top 10 of U.S. fine dining rooms 1 / 16 Back to Gallery Trip Advisor , the world's largest travel site, has named Pappas Bros. Steakhouse to its 2015 list of Best Fine Dining Restaurants in the United States .
The Houston restaurant was singled out as No. 10 on a list of 25. It earned a higher ranking than well-regarded restaurants such as the French Laundry in Yountville, Calif., and Colicchio & Sons in New York City.
The Trip Advisor listing provided two Quote: s about Pappas Bros. from its famous user reviews:
"The perfect steak served in classic surroundings."
"Best steak I've ever had, but make sure to reserve."
Related Stories Top 21 dishes to try in Houston Pappas Bros. Steakhouse was No. 73 on Alison Cook's Top 100 Houston restaurants list, which was released last month. Cook singled out the restaurants "legendary" wine list and dry-aging program.
Pappas Bros. will open at second Houston-area store downtown at 1200 McKinney later this year.
Pappas Bros.: 5839 Westheimer, 713-780-7352
